long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Map your Travel was born out of a personal frustration with planning travel itineraries. As an avid traveler, I often found myself reading through numerous travel blogs and articles, manually noting down interesting places to visit. I realized there had to be a better way to automatically extract and visualize these locations.

The Solution:
This Chrome extension simplifies the travel planning process by automatically identifying and mapping locations mentioned in any web page. Whether you're reading a food blog, a travel article, or a local guide, Map your Travel instantly creates an interactive map of all mentioned places, complete with travel times and distances from your location.

Key Features:
1. Automatic restaurant names extraction from any web page
2. Interactive mapping with Google Maps integration
3. Travel time and distance calculations
4. Location caching for faster repeated access.
